casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Travis Travon SAMMONS, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156189
COA: 332190 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 3, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing its supplemental reply is GRANTED. The supplemental reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before May 30, 2019.
